name: Sweaty Palms (itch)
description:
Sweaty Palms is a climbing romp featuring The Magnificent Murdoc. The Show is only one week away and this washed up acrobat needs to prepare. Toil, flail, and sweat your way to the top.

Controls Supported:

  • Mouse Only
  • Gamepad (Left thumbstick + A/B/X/Y)

Version 0.18.1

This is a demo build so if you are interested in seeing a full game made from this, feel free to let me know.

Developed by @TheCalooch
